alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson and east central Leon Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 442 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Monticello, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Chaires, Chaires Crossroads, Festus, Waukeenah, Baum, Capps, Lloyd, Miccosukee, Pisgah Church, Lake Miccosukee and Capitola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
